attributes.action: RAF helicopters to help clear M25 accidents
attributes.additional_details: Please can we have one or two of the Royal Air Force’s  Boeing Chinook (HC3?) helicopters on permanent  24/7 standby at Royal Air Force Northolt specifically tasked to aid the Highways Agency in rapid extraction of crash damaged vehicles off the M25 motorway to a nearby secure storage area.  The helicopters could be fitted with high quality day & night image recording pods to capture video evidence of the scene. The M25 could then be re-opened within say an hour maximum of a non-fatal accident instead of the eternity it currently takes! Simples!
